page.title: 15The Fosseway, Kinoulton
page.content: The{Fosse Way}runs straight through our{Domesday}area in a Northerly direction.There are five Major towns on the{Fosse Way-}Lincoln, Leicester, Coventry,Bath and Exeter.The Fosse Way starts at{Lincoln}and ends at{Exeter. The{Fosse}is approximately 230 miles long.There are five{Roman Stations}on the Fosse Way in Nottinghamshire.One near Willoughby_on_the_Wolds.One between East Bridgford and Car Colston.One at Brough another at Littleborough and one unknown one.There are no villages actually on the Fosse Way.It was safer to be set back from the road. The Fosse Way is known as the{A46 and it is a very busy road.The Fosse Way is one of the few Roman roads still in use.
